DICE Firmware Compiled on 8 Oct 2009
Main Page | Modules | Alphabetical List | Data Structures | Data Fields | Related Pages

Core Modules

Detailed Description

The core modules provide essential functionality for the application layers to utilize.


Modules

 Link Abstraction Layer
 This module provides all necessary interfaces for upper layers to access nodes on the bus and to handle requests from other nodes in any desired 1394 Register Space address range.
 AV System (AVS)
 Exposes an Isochronous Interface configuration API for stream format, direction, isoc channel, packet size, etc.
 Connection Management Procedures (CMP)
 This module implements the connection management procedures defined in IEC 61883-1.
 Isochronous Resource Management (IRM)
 This module implements functions to manage isochronous channels and bandwidth.
 Abstraction MIDI Layer (AML)
 This module provides Abstraction MIDI layer function to user.
Untitled Document
